title: How do bands who offer pay-what-you-want music generate profits? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is because they make NO money off the music it’s already a loss. this MAY attract more fans who then would come to shows. the bands end game is to make money from touring and playing live.
This works for groups like radiohead because they have a massive following. Most bands don't have the fan numbers to make this work.
